name: places/ChIJgZUXdiBZwokRRDLXtbXe-F8
formattedAddress: 6 W 28th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10001, USA
adrFormatAddress: 6 W 28th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10001-6409, USA

editorialSummary.text: Korean & Japanese nibbles & fancy cocktails in a cool, brick-lined bar with karaoke rooms.

originalText.text:
Just made a reservation at Ms. Kim’s and the gentleman on the phone was incredibly kind and accommodating! We will be heading there this Saturday, I will update to reflect our overall experience, but so far I am already impressed with the service. Can’t wait!!!

Update: Yup, they can definitely keep those 5 stars! The service was EXCEPTIONAL all around from the bartender with the amazing voice, the friendly host who was more than helpful, and the hardworking server who assisted us with all of our needs.

The rooms were very spacious and clean, had great song selections, and they even included cute props. Drinks were not only a work of art but tasted amazing!

originalText.text:
Went with my friend for a girls night out and absolutely loved it. The rooms are spacious and very nicely decorated.

The drinks are amazing, definitely suggest the butterfly!

The food is also really good. The fries are bombastic!

I really enjoyed the atmosphere and the staff was very friendly and welcoming.

If you're looking for a a new karaoke spot hands down check this one out for some fun!

originalText.text: Very beautiful and bougie karaoke spot. It looks a lot bigger online but it’s a small space. The rooms were clean  and I love that they provided instruments for us to use. Good song selection, and the drinks were good. The food was good but I wish dip was provided for the wings.

text.text: Very beautiful and bougie karaoke spot. It looks a lot bigger online but it’s a small space. The rooms were clean  and I love that they provided instruments for us to use. Good song selection, and the drinks were good. The food was good but I wish dip was provided for the wings.

originalText.text: We had an amazing team outting at Ms. Kim's Lounge. The decor and atmosphere was very high end, the song selection vast, and the entire staff very friendly and accommodating. The drink menu was imaginative and we were also able to purchase proper champagne. The rooms came equipped with maracas and tambourines, the restroom facilities were well maintained. We had a wonderful evening at Ms. Kim's. I hope to return soon!

text.text: We had an amazing team outting at Ms. Kim's Lounge. The decor and atmosphere was very high end, the song selection vast, and the entire staff very friendly and accommodating. The drink menu was imaginative and we were also able to purchase proper champagne. The rooms came equipped with maracas and tambourines, the restroom facilities were well maintained. We had a wonderful evening at Ms. Kim's. I hope to return soon!

originalText.text:
A slick and cozy Korean- Japanese fusion lounge and karaoke bar at the 2F of 6 West 28th St close to Korean Town in Manhattan. Closest subway station is 28th St or 34th Herald Square.

You will be greeted by friendly staff right as you enter the main entrance, where a long bar area awaits you.

Spacious lounge areas with a wide glass window to enjoy views of iconic buildings. They also have private rooms to cater various group numbers with karaoke. The room is well equipped with high tech gears to enjoy your evening party.

Few food choices but it's full of flavors. The cocktails lists were just perfect pair for foods. They serve beers, lagers and soju.

The staff were friendly and attends to you throughout your stay. Fast service.

Perfect place for a couple date, groups or even a treat to your self.

Will definitely recommend. $$
